title: datadaptor-crosstabser-table_charter-demo
text:
Note



Please be patient! It will take a little while until everything is set up and you can run the code in the interactive cells.


This is the interactive demo-repo to show how the combination of the packages datadaptor, crosstabser & table_charter can be used to calculate crosstabs from labelled survey data (or any data.frame).






Note



Running the code cell in Section 4 will recalculate the crosstabs & update the table_charter app in Section 5.

text:
3 Syntax to generate crosstabs
This is an example how you can generate tables along the y axis of the crosstabs:








To define the columns along the x-axis of the crosstabs, you just need to define a character vector of variable names (cf. df):

title: datadaptor-crosstabser-table_charter-demo
text:
4 Calculate crosstabs
If you have modified the input data above, running this cell will reprint the calculated crosstabs (running the crosstabser R package in RStudio will give you a color-formatted print output), and recalculate the according data input for the table_charter app at the bottom of this website:
